hero_content.title:
Scale your tech
team with us
hero_content.description:
Create an impactful team of technology experts with our
end-to-end Talent Sourcing, Training & Onboarding Solutions

features.title: Why ProGrad is your one-stop talent solution?

list.name: Faster Turnaround Time
list.gist:
With ProGrad you get access to
some of the best talents in the
industry in a short turnaround
time averaging at about 4 weeks.

list.name: Tailor Made Solutions
list.gist:
Get a range of bespoke solutions for your
talent needs. Our customized approach
allows us to deliver efficient, effective
and scalable solutions.

list.name: Higher ROI
list.gist:
With readily deployable candidates, you
not only save on the cost & time of training,
but can generate higher revenues
from day one.

list.name: Best in Industry Talent
list.gist:
We help you create an impactful team of
skilled developers who can deliver speed,
efficiency and impact across your projects.

testimonials.name: Ananthakrishnan G
testimonials.text: We are extremely happy with the performance of ProGrads from a technical point of view. They have an appetite to learn new tech stacks quickly and adapt to our product engineering needs.
testimonials.desc: But more importantly, their attitude towards work given is what we are extremely proud of. The responsibility & accountability they have shown certainly is commendable. This is something certainly that reflects throughout, and we are definitely happy with their output.

testimonials.name: Manisha Narayanan
testimonials.text: Excellent talent at ProGrad!, ProGrads that we hired, in spite of being freshers, scaled and evolved in a very short span of time and are now single-handedly manoeuvring complex projects.
testimonials.desc: With ProGrads, the willingness to run extra miles on the topics that they aren’t aware is excellent and commendable.

testimonials.name: Abhilash Hebbar
testimonials.designation: Co-Founder and Head of Engineering, Lets Flo
testimonials.text: Recruiting ProGrads has been one of the best hiring experiences I’ve ever had. A big thanks for the support and co-operation during the entire process.
testimonials.desc: Hoping to collaborate with ProGrad soon for another requirement.

list.title: Tell us your requirement
list.description: We understand the specifics of your needs like your talent problems, timeline expectations, and your business objectives.

list.title: Get personalized recommendations
list.description: Our talent solution experts evaluate your needs and create a customized plan that aligns with your goals and objectives.

list.title: Finalize your talent pipeline
list.description: Build a long-term hiring or training pipeline with us for your freshers and lateral talent needs

list.title: Meet your goals
list.description: Form a team of agile, flexible, and future proof developers in a record turnaround time
